Description.Text:
Arlington House was built between 1934 and 1936 as a private residential block with 120 apartments, many of which incorporated separate servant quarters. The apartment block backs onto Green Park and adjoins the rear of the famous Ritz Hotel, Piccadilly. The building was designed by Michael Rosenauer, a well-know architect who also designed the Time & Life Building in New Bond Street. Situated in Arlington Street, St James's, Arlington House is the ideal base for business or pleasure. The building has recently undergone a major refurbishment programme. Unusually, the building also has its own car park directly underground. There is a taxi rank just outside, or, Green Park tube station is a few minutes walk with the Piccadilly, Jubilee and Victoria line services. Whether you are travelling for business or pleasure, Arlington House can provide an exclusive and convenient base for the length of your stay you require. The serviced apartments in Central London are located in St. James's and are the ideal choice whether travelling alone, with friends or indeed with the family. Location, space, comfort and stunning views are just a few reasons why you should choose Arlington House as your choice of residence when visiting London, whether its just for a long weekend a week or even a year.
IMPORTANT INFORMATION:
Security Deposit A security deposit to is taken one day prior to arrival and will be refunded on or after departure. 1-3 nights - deposit of 1 night's stay 3-6 nights - deposit of 2 night's stay 6-12 nights - deposit of 5 night's stay
Check In and Check Out Times Check in is from 14:00 and check out is by 12:00. 24 Hours On Site Reception.
Cards Accepted Visa, Euro/Mastercard, Maestro, Solo, Switch The Apartment reserves the right to pre-authorise credit cards prior to arrival.
Cancellation Policy Notice of cancellation is required more than 14 days prior to arrival to avoid a cancellation charge equal to the total cost of the stay.
Maid services five days a week, laundry of linen and towels once a week. The maid services is restricted to general cleaning, making beds and hovering the floor areasand does not normally include personal maid service.

Arlington House is an exclusive residential apartment block built pre World War 2 overlooking Green Park in the heart of St. James's. It is positioned in a quite Cul-de-Sac between Green Park and St James's Street just off Piccadilly in Central London. The apartment building overlooks Green Park and is located in the same street as the famous Ritz Hotel, Piccadilly.

Studio - The studio features a double bedroom with a private bathroom, air conditioning, touch-panel lighting, LCD satellite TV and a separate seating area. Also includes a fully-fitted kitchen with a washing machine, dishwasher, oven & hob, microwave and fridge freezer.
1 Bedroom Apartment - This one-bedroom apartment features a king-size/zip & link bed, private bathroom, separate guest cloak room, air conditioning, touch-panel lighting and an LCD satellite TV. Also includes a fully-fitted kitchen with a washing machine, dishwasher, oven & hob, microwave and fridge freezer.
2 Bedroom Apartment - The 2-bedroom apartment features one king-size bedroom with a private bathroom and one twin bedroom with a separate bathroom. It also includes a separate cloak room, air conditioning, touch-panel lighting and an LCD satellite TV. A fully-fitted kitchen is included, with a washing machine, dishwasher, oven & hob, microwave and fridge freezer.
3 Bedroom Apartments - The 3-bedroom apartment includes 2 bedrooms with king-size beds, 1 double bedroom and 2 private bathrooms. It also includes a guest cloak room, air conditioning, touch-panel lighting and an LCD satellite TV. It comes with a fully-fitted kitchen including a washing machine, dishwasher, oven & hob, microwave and fridge freezer.
